column1: ##Project Description=Human cells from cartilage and meniscus (healthy) for 3' SC v3.1 RNA seq 10x Protocol CG000315 Rev B Dual Index  Sample Date = 9/24/2021  2 samples:  Sample 1: cartilage cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 25,000 reads/cell, ~250 million reads/sample  Sample 2: meniscus cells Target ~10,000 cells Target 25,000 reads/cell, ~250 million reads/sample  NextSeq Flowcell = 500mil reads of a P3 100 cycle flowcell, shared with Lotz/Hannah 092321 Project.
